name: Section 1
desc: These players perform below average across all economic indicators. On average, they post between 2-4 auctions per month across 1-2 item categories.

name: Section 2
desc: These players are midrange performers across all dimensions. On average, they post between 11-28 auctions per month across 2-5 item categories.

name: Section 3
desc: These are the most active users across all KPIs. They typically post 152 auctions per month across 8 item categories.
